Row.Text: Our people are now taking courses in "Advanced Fortress Building" and "Rude Letter Writing 101". I worry the rest of the world will also succumb to the influence of your culture."

Our [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital is still but a town. We should build new fortresses and walls to fortify it, thus preventing it from falling into enemy hands.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be the Dervish State [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be at War [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must have reached the Industrial era [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Gold} [ICON_GOLD] Gold [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive an Engineer Specialist slot in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from Engineer specialists [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from Forts [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from Citadels [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+25% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production when building militaristic buildings

Our [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital is still but a town. We should build new fortresses and walls to fortify it, thus preventing it from falling into enemy hands.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive an Engineer Specialist slot in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from Engineer specialists [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from Forts [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from Citadels [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+25% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production when building militaristic buildings
Abdullah Hassan has fortified his Capital.
Enacting the Fortify Taleh decision provides 1 Engineer Specialist slot as well as +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from Engineer specialists
Enacting the Fortify Taleh decision provides 1 Engineer Specialist slot as well as +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from Engineer specialists

We live in a strategic location where many caravans pass - caravans owned by our rivals. They bring in much gold and fine wares. We should put these trade route under our hegemony, to further our goals.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be the Dervish State [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must have reached the Renaissance Era [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Culture} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital's production is rushed whenever you plunder a Trade Route

We live in a strategic location where many caravans pass - caravans owned by our rivals. They bring in much gold and fine wares. We should put these trade route under our hegemony, to further our goals.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital's production is rushed whenever you plunder a Trade Route
The Dervishes have begun "redirecting" trade routes to their cities.

While many remain loyal to us our prestigious King, some rather swear fealty to treachery and fiendishness. Some of these traitors are locked up behind bars, and must be appropriated with sincere and decisive action. Our advisors suggest we should institute an official execution field for them.
No, they are still our brothers.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_GoldenAge} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age points[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Permanent reduction to Enemy Spy efficiency in all Cities[ENDCOLOR]
By creating an official execution field for traitors befallen to treachery and fiendishness, we have scared away foreign spies and the like.
The traitors will stay locked up for the time being.
In the Dervish State an official execution field has been created to deal with those who do not love their most prestigious King.
World event text - not used - can delete.

A foreign statesman from the City-State of {1_CS} has sent us a letter. It contains highly rude and unjust accusations of theft of an official gun. This gun was, in fact, bought from some of his soldiers, who have obviously lied to their commander.[NEWLINE]What should we do about this?
We have replied the foreign statesman with a letter even more rude! This has damaged our relationship with {1_CS}, but also contributed to our path towards a Golden Age.
Admitting to false accusations has halted our progress on the path towards a Golden Age, but our influence with {1_CS} has improved greatly.
We have chosen to ignore the letter from {1_CS}.
In The Dervish State writing rude letters to foreign statesmen has become a national activity.
The Dervish State and the City-State of {1_CS} has recently been getting along very well!
World event text - not used - can delete.
